H0.text: Nonvascular plants were the first plants to evolve.

H1.text: Fungi were the first plants to evolve.

H2.text: Photoreactive plants were the first plants to evolve.

H3.text: Trees were the first plants to evolve.

A4.text: The groups included in the Viridiplantae are sometimes called 'lower plants', referring to their status as the earliest plant groups to evolve.
